App.name: Personal Finance Dashboard
App.prompt: Create a dashboard that helps me track my monthly expenses, investments, and savings goals with charts and notifications for bill payments

App.name: Recipe Manager
App.prompt: Build a recipe management app where I can save recipes, plan meals for the week, and generate shopping lists automatically

App.name: Habit Tracker
App.prompt: Design an app to track daily habits with streaks, mood tracking, and progress insights over time

App.name: Project Management Tool
App.prompt: Create a simple project management tool with kanban boards, task assignments, and deadline tracking

App.name: Social Media Scheduler
App.prompt: Build an app to schedule and preview social media posts across different platforms with analytics dashboard

App.name: Workout Planner
App.prompt: Create a fitness app that generates personalized workout plans and tracks progress with exercise demonstrations

App.name: Time Tracker
App.prompt: Build a time tracking app for freelancers with project categorization, invoicing, and productivity insights

App.name: Learning Platform
App.prompt: Design an educational app with course creation, progress tracking, and interactive quizzes

Flow.name: Email AI Response
Flow.prompt: When I receive an email, analyze the content and draft a response using AI

Flow.name: Invoice Processing
Flow.prompt: When a new invoice arrives in my email, extract the details, categorize it, and create a payment reminder

Flow.name: Lead Qualification
Flow.prompt: When a new lead fills out my contact form, score them based on their responses and assign to the right sales person

Flow.name: Content Distribution
Flow.prompt: When I publish a blog post, automatically share it across my social media channels with customized messages for each platform

Flow.name: Document Approval
Flow.prompt: When a team member uploads a document, route it through the appropriate approval chain and notify stakeholders

Flow.name: Customer Onboarding
Flow.prompt: When a new customer signs up, send welcome emails, schedule an intro call, and create their account workspace

Flow.name: Support Ticket Triage
Flow.prompt: When a support ticket comes in, analyze urgency, categorize the issue, and route to the right department

Flow.name: Meeting Scheduler
Flow.prompt: When someone requests a meeting, check calendar availability, suggest time slots, and send calendar invites

AI Agent.name: Meeting Summarizer
AI Agent.prompt: Create an AI agent that joins my meetings, takes notes, and sends a summary with action items to all participants

AI Agent.name: Research Assistant
AI Agent.prompt: Build an AI agent that can research a topic, compile key findings, and create a structured report with citations

AI Agent.name: Social Media Manager
AI Agent.prompt: Design an AI agent that generates engaging social media content and responds to comments while maintaining brand voice

AI Agent.name: Email Classifier
AI Agent.prompt: Create an AI agent that reads my emails, categorizes them by priority, and suggests quick responses

AI Agent.name: Code Reviewer
AI Agent.prompt: Build an AI agent that reviews pull requests, suggests improvements, and checks for security vulnerabilities

AI Agent.name: Customer Support Bot
AI Agent.prompt: Create an AI agent that handles common customer inquiries and knows when to escalate to human support

AI Agent.name: Content Editor
AI Agent.prompt: Design an AI agent that proofreads content, suggests improvements, and ensures consistent brand tone

AI Agent.name: Sales Assistant
AI Agent.prompt: Build an AI agent that qualifies leads, schedules demos, and sends personalized follow-ups

Database.name: Content Library
Database.prompt: Design a database for my digital content with tags, categories, usage rights, and version history

Database.name: Customer Relations
Database.prompt: Create a database to track customer interactions, purchase history, support tickets, and communication preferences

Database.name: Project Archive
Database.prompt: Build a database to store project details, team members, timelines, and deliverables with easy search functionality

Database.name: Resource Booking
Database.prompt: Design a database for managing meeting rooms, equipment, and resource bookings with conflict prevention

Database.name: Inventory System
Database.prompt: Create a database to track product inventory, suppliers, purchase orders, and stock levels across locations

Database.name: Learning Management
Database.prompt: Design a database for storing course content, student progress, assignments, and certification tracking

Database.name: Asset Management
Database.prompt: Build a database to track company assets, maintenance schedules, warranties, and assignment history

Database.name: Event Planning
Database.prompt: Create a database for managing events, attendees, vendors, schedules, and budget tracking

Interface.name: Quick Actions Panel
Interface.prompt: Design a floating command palette interface that lets users quickly search and execute common actions

Interface.name: Data Import Wizard
Interface.prompt: Create a step-by-step interface for users to upload, validate, and import data with error handling

Interface.name: Profile Editor
Interface.prompt: Design an intuitive interface for users to manage their profile, privacy settings, and notification preferences

Interface.name: Report Builder
Interface.prompt: Create a drag-and-drop interface for users to build custom reports by selecting data fields and visualizations

Interface.name: Dashboard Creator
Interface.prompt: Design an interface where users can create custom dashboards by arranging and configuring widgets

Interface.name: File Manager
Interface.prompt: Build a modern file management interface with drag-and-drop, preview capabilities, and sharing options

Interface.name: Settings Console
Interface.prompt: Create an organized settings interface with search, categories, and visual toggles for complex configurations

Interface.name: Kanban Board
Interface.prompt: Design a drag-and-drop kanban interface with customizable columns, card details, and filtering options

Form.name: Event Registration
Form.prompt: Create a form for event registration with dynamic pricing, ticket selection, and dietary preferences

Form.name: Client Onboarding
Form.prompt: Design a multi-step form to collect new client information, project requirements, and brand assets

Form.name: Feedback Collection
Form.prompt: Build a form to gather user feedback with rating scales, open-ended questions, and file upload capability

Form.name: Service Quote
Form.prompt: Create a dynamic form that calculates service quotes based on selected options and requirements

Form.name: Job Application
Form.prompt: Design a comprehensive job application form with resume upload, work history, and skill assessment

Form.name: Support Request
Form.prompt: Create a smart support form that guides users through issue reporting with conditional fields

Form.name: Product Configurator
